additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium C14-16 olefin sulfonate, Cocamide MIPA, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Glycerin, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, Argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil, Tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), Panthenol, Coco-glucoside, Polyquaternium-10*, Polyquaternium-68*, Hydrogenated palm glycerides citrate, Polyquaternium-7, Glycol distearate, PEG-150 distearate, Glyceryl oleate, Tocopherol, Guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, Sodium hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Citric acid, Magnesium chloride, Sodium chloride, Sodium lauroyl sarcosinate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Magnesium nitrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium benzoate, Fumaric acid, Isopropanolamine, Parfum/Fragrance Alpha isomethyl ionone, Hexyl cinnamal (*Curl Activating Complex/Complexe d'activation des boucles)

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes, rinse well with water immediately.
